Organ.Name: IA
Organ.CranialL: Mylo-hyoid m.
Organ.CaudalL: Platysma m. (caudal edge of the anterior belly of digastric mm)
Organ.AnteriorL: Symphysis menti
Organ.PosteriorL: Body of hyoid bone/mylo-hyoid m.
Organ.MedialL: NA
Organ.LateralL: Medial edge of ant. belly of digastric

Organ.Name: IB
Organ.CranialL: Cranial edge of submandibular gland; anteriorly, mylo-hyoid m.
Organ.CaudalL: Plane through caudal edge of hyoid bone and caudal edge of mandible; alternatively caudal edge of submandibular gland (whichever is more caudal)/platysma m.
Organ.AnteriorL: Symphysis menti
Organ.PosteriorL: Posterior edge of submandibular gland (caudally)/posterior belly of digastric m. (cranially)
Organ.MedialL: Lateral edge of ant. belly of digastric m. (caudally)/posterior belly of digastric m. (cranially)
Organ.LateralL: Medial aspect (innerside) of mandible down to caudal edge/platysma m. (caudal)/medial pterygoid m.(posteriorly)

Organ.Name: II
Organ.CranialL: Caudal edge of the lateral process of C1.
Organ.CaudalL: Caudal edge of the body of the hyoid bone
Organ.AnteriorL: Posterior edge of the submandibular gland/posterior edge of posterior belly of digastric m.
Organ.PosteriorL: Posterior edge of sternocleidomastoid m
Organ.MedialL: Medial edge of internal carotid artery/scalenius m.
Organ.LateralL: Deep (medial) surface of sternocleidomastoid m./platysma m./ parotid gland/ posterior belly of digastric m

Organ.Name: III
Organ.CranialL: Caudal edge of the body of the hyoid bone
Organ.CaudalL: Caudal edge of cricoid cartilage.
Organ.AnteriorL: Anterior edge of sternocleidomastoid m./posterior third of thyro-hyoid m.
Organ.PosteriorL: Posterior edge of sternocleidomastoid m.
Organ.MedialL: Medial edge of common carotid artery/scalenius mm.
Organ.LateralL: TDeep (medial) surface of sternocleidomastoid m

Organ.Name: IVa
Organ.CranialL: Caudal edge of cricoid cartilage
Organ.CaudalL: 2 cm cranial to sternal manubrium
Organ.AnteriorL: Anterior edge of sternocleidomastoid m. (cranially)/body of sternocleidomastoid m. (caudally)
Organ.PosteriorL: Posterior edge of sternocleidomastoid m. (cranially)/scalenius mm. (caudally)
Organ.MedialL: Medial edge of common carotid artery/lateral edge of thyroid gland/ scalenius mm. (cranially)/medial edge of sternocleidomastoid m. (caudally)
Organ.LateralL: Deep (medial) surface of sternocleidomastoid m. (cranially)/lateral edge of sternocleidomastoid m. (caudally)

Organ.Name: IVb
Organ.CranialL: Caudal border of level IVa (2 cm cranial to sternal manubrium)
Organ.CaudalL: Cranial edge of sternal manubrium
Organ.AnteriorL: Deep surface of sternocleidomastoid m./deep aspect of clavicle
Organ.PosteriorL: Anterior edge of scalenius mm. (cranially)/apex of lung, the brachiocephalic vein, the brachiocephalic trunc (right side) and the common carotid artery and subclavian artery on the left side (caudally)
Organ.MedialL: Lateral border of level VI (pre-tracheal component)/medial edge of common carotid artery
Organ.LateralL: Lateral edge of scalenius m.

Organ.Name: Vab
Organ.CranialL: Cranial edge of the body of hyoid bone
Organ.CaudalL: Plane just below transverse cervical vessels
Organ.AnteriorL: Posterior edge of sternocleidomastoid m.
Organ.PosteriorL: Anterior border of trapezius m
Organ.MedialL: Levator scapulae m./scalenius m. (caudally)
Organ.LateralL: Platysma m./skin.

Organ.Name: Vc
Organ.CranialL: Plane just below transverse cervical vessels (caudal border of level V).
Organ.CaudalL: 2 cm cranial to sternal manubrium, i.e. caudal border of level IVa
Organ.AnteriorL: Skin
Organ.PosteriorL: Anterior border of trapezius m. (cranially)/±1 cm anterior to serratus anterior m. (caudally)
Organ.MedialL: Scalenius m./lateral edge of sternocleidomastoid m, lateral edge of level IVa
Organ.LateralL: Trapezius m (cranially)/clavicle (caudally)

Organ.Name: VIa
Organ.CranialL: Caudal edge of the hyoid bone or caudal edge of the sub- mandibular gland, whichever is more caudal
Organ.CaudalL: Cranial edge of the sternal manubrium.
Organ.AnteriorL: Skin/platysma m.
Organ.PosteriorL: nterior aspect of the infrahyoid (strap) mm.
Organ.MedialL: NA
Organ.LateralL: Anterior edges of both sternocleidomastoid mm.

Organ.Name: VIb
Organ.CranialL: Caudal edge of the thyroid cartilage (a)
Organ.CaudalL: Cranial edge of the sternal manubrium
Organ.AnteriorL: TPosterior aspect of infrahyoid (strap) mm.
Organ.PosteriorL: Anterior aspect of larynx, thyroid gland and trachea (pre-laryngeal and pre-tracheal nodes)/pre-vertebral m. (right side)/esophagus (left side)
Organ.MedialL: Lateral aspect of trachea and esophagus (caudally)
Organ.LateralL: Common carotid artery on both sides
Organ.Comment: (a) For tumors located on the anterior floor of month, tip of the tongue and lower lip, caudal edge of the body of the hyoid bone.

Organ.Name: VIIa
Organ.CranialL: Upper edge of body of c1/hard palate
Organ.CaudalL: Cranial edge of the body of the hyoid bone.
Organ.AnteriorL: Posterior edge of the superior or middle pharyngeal constrictor m.
Organ.PosteriorL: Longus capitis m. and longus colli m.
Organ.MedialL: A line parallel to the lateral edge of the longus capiti muscle
Organ.LateralL: Medial edge of the internal carotid artery

Organ.Name: VIIb
Organ.CranialL: Base of skull (jugular foramen)
Organ.CaudalL: Caudal edge of the lateral process of C1 (upper limit of level II)
Organ.AnteriorL: Posterior edge of prestyloid para-pharyngeal space
Organ.PosteriorL: Vertebral body of C1, base of skull
Organ.MedialL: Medial edge of the internal carotid artery
Organ.LateralL: Styloid process/deep parotid lobe

Organ.Name: VIII
Organ.CranialL: Zygomatic arch, external auditory canal
Organ.CaudalL: Angle of the mandible
Organ.AnteriorL: Posterior edge of mandidular ramus and posterior edge of masseter m. (laterally) medial pterygoid muscle (medially)
Organ.PosteriorL: Anterior edge of sternocleidomastoid m. (laterally), posterior belly of digastric m. (medially)
Organ.MedialL: Styloid process and styloid m
Organ.LateralL: SMAS layer in sub-cutaneous tissue

Organ.Name: IX
Organ.CranialL: Caudal edge of the orbit
Organ.CaudalL: Caudal edge of the mandible
Organ.AnteriorL: SMAS layer in sub-cutaneous tissue
Organ.PosteriorL: nterior edge of masseter m. and corpus adiposum buccae (bichat’s fat pad)
Organ.MedialL: Buccinator m.
Organ.LateralL: SMAS layer in sub-cutaneous tissue

Organ.Name: Xa
Organ.CranialL: NA
Organ.CaudalL: NA
Organ.AnteriorL: NA
Organ.PosteriorL: NA
Organ.MedialL: NA
Organ.LateralL: NA

Organ.Name: Xb
Organ.CranialL: NA
Organ.CaudalL: NA
Organ.AnteriorL: NA
Organ.PosteriorL: NA
Organ.MedialL: NA
Organ.LateralL: NA
